title: Closet Treats
description: Reality is a slippery slope for Trey Leger, but he's managed to carve out a somewhat normal existence in spite of his mental illness. But when an ice cream truck starts making the rounds of his neighborhood, Trey can no longer tell reality from his delusions.Included is the essay, "The Death Of Childhood", that inspired the novel and launched Shadowpublications.com.
author: Paul Elard Cooley
